test.name: TEST-DEF-80400
test.description: Create a test for the pmk_sparc_enable_cache and pmk_sparc_disable_cache system calls. Run the same code in a second non-authorized partition and check that a Health Monitor event is generated.

teststep.description: Call pmk_sparc_enable_cache with an invalid Cache Type argument. Return Code: PAL_INVALID_PARAM
Call pmk_sparc_disable_cache with an invalid Cache Type argument. Return Code: PAL_INVALID_PARAM
Try to activate Both Caches. Since they are already enabled at configuration level the return code shall be PAL_NO_ACTION.
Deactivate instruction cache. Action shall succeed with PAL_NO_ERROR. Sleep for one tick.
Read the cache control register. Verify that the instruction cache is disabled and the data cache is enabled.
Deactivate data cache. Action shall succeed with PAL_NO_ERROR. Sleep for one tick.
Read the cache control register. Verify that both caches are disabled.
Call pmk_sparc_disable_cache for every CACHE_TYPE when cache management is not allowed at configuration level. Return Code: PAL_INVALID_CONFIG
Call pmk_sparc_enable_cache for every CACHE_TYPE when cache management is not allowed at configuration level. Return Code: PAL_INVALID_CONFIG
Try to activate the instruction cache. Since it is already enabled at configuration level the return code shall be PAL_NO_ACTION.
Try to deactivate the data cache. Since it is already deactivated at configuration level the return code shall be PAL_NO_ACTION.
Activate Both Caches. Action shall succeed with PAL_NO_ERROR.
Read the cache control register. Verify that both caches are enabled.
Try to activate the data cache. Since it is already enabled at configuration level the return code shall be PAL_NO_ACTION.
Try to deactivate the instruction cache. Since it is already deactivated at configuration level the return code shall be PAL_NO_ACTION.
Deactivate Both Caches. Action shall succeed with PAL_NO_ERROR. Sleep for one tick.
Read the cache control register. Verify that both caches are disabled.
Deactivate Both Caches. Since both caches are disabled, pmk_sparc_disable_cache shall return PAL_NO_ACTION.
